text: Pascoal Manuel Mocumbi (10 April 1941 â€“ 25 March 2023) was a Mozambican politician. He was the Prime Minister of Mozambique from 1994 until 2004. Between 2004 and 2013, Mocumbi was the High Representative of the European and Developing Countries Clinical Trials Partnership (EDCTP).Commission on Social Determinants of Health: Pascoal Mocumbi World Health Organization. Mocumbi died on 25 March 2023, at the age of 81, after several years of poor health. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Mozambique
title: Pascoal Mocumbi
